name: Busted Magic
description:
Someguy's entry to the Gunner Parade '22 Game Jam!

#gunnerparade22

Mey's magical experiments ended in disaster! Now she must clean it up before the library is doomed!

Use the Shot button to destroy enemies and targets. Hold the Focus button to move slow and deal more damage.

Collect Blue cubes to gain MP. When enough MP is obtained, you can use the Thunder Bomber! Hold the Bomb button to aim and release to fire.

Collect Gold jewels to gain score! You gain an extra life every 1000 gold jewels collected.

Uncover secret targets by using the focus attack! Breaking them rewards a fortune!
